name: 4 Minutes to Planet Zixus(My First Game Ever)
name_original: 4 Minutes to Planet Zixus(My First Game Ever)
description:
You are flying to a planet called Zixus. Like rockets in real life,  your rocket will go  through various different stages unless you(astronaut) are left to make the remaining journey. But, there will be a lot of asteroids in your way which you have to maneuver through to reach to your destination. There are also barriers that you cannot cross or else your rocket will blow up and you will die. BUT, WAIT!!!!There is a catch. During your voyage you may encounter a elephantine meteor that blocks your way leading to NO escape. Or is it, well here's a hint for you to cheat your way through the meteor. I am only giving it to you so use it carefully.(waTcH tHHe Rght barrier's siZe Whn the meteor strikes. If it gets bIgR you MAAy gettt a wiNdw through IT fOr a Feu seconds.)

Controls: D to move right, A to move left.

(Also if the game is not loading or the keys are not working, then please reload the page)
